briefTitle: A Study of the Efficacy and Safety of Relacorilant in Patients With Cortisol-Secreting Adrenal Adenomas

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Shows lack of cortisol suppression on dexamethasone suppression test
* Suppressed or low early-morning adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH) levels
* A radiologically confirmed adrenal lesion
* Has IGT or DM
* Has uncontrolled HTN

Exclusion Criteria:

* Has severe, uncontrolled HTN
* Has poorly controlled DM
* Has DM Type 1
* Has significantly abnormal liver test results or severe renal insufficiency
* Has uncontrolled, clinically significant hypothyroidism or hyperthyroidism

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Average 24-hour SBP
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood pressure was measured by 24-hour ABPM. The 24-hour average SBP is reported.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients With 1 or More Treatment-emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) as Graded by CTCAE v5.0.
Change in Area Under the Concentration-time Curve of Blood Glucose (AUCglucose)
outcomeMeasures.description: AUCglucose was calculated based on results of the plasma 2-hour oGTT.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Average Diastolic Blood Pressure (DBP)
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood pressure was measured by 24-hour ABPM. Daytime average DBP was measured from 06:00 to 21:59. Nighttime average DBP was measure from 22:00 to 05:59.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Average Heart Rate (HR)
outcomeMeasures.description: Heart rate was measured by 24-hour ABPM. Daytime average HR was measured from 06:00 to 21:59. Nighttime average HR was measure from 22:00 to 05:59.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Average Daytime and Nighttime SBP
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood pressure was measured by 24-hour ABPM. Daytime average SBP was measured from 06:00 to 21:59. Nighttime average SBP was measure from 22:00 to 05:59.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Hemoglobin HbA1c for Patients With HbA1c ≥5.7% at Baseline
Change in HbA1c for Patients With HbA1c ≥6.5% at Baseline
Number of Patients With DM Who Achieved 2-hour oGTT Glucose <140 mg/dL
outcomeMeasures.description: Glucose was measured using the 2 hour timepoint of the 2-hour oGTT.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients With IGT Who Achieved 2-hour oGTT Glucose <140 mg/dL
outcomeMeasures.description: Glucose was measured using the 2 hour timepoint of the 2-hour oGTT.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients With Any Dose Decrease in Antihypertensive Medication
Number of Patients With Any Dose Decrease in Diabetes Medication
Number of Patients With Any Dose Increase or Switch in Antihypertensive Medication
Number of Patients With Any Dose Increase or Switch in Diabetes Medication
Number of Patients With HbA1c ≥6.5% at Baseline Who Achieved HbA1c <6.5%
Number of Patients With Normalization of the 24-hour Average SBP (<130 mm Hg)
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood pressure was measured by 24-hour ABPM Test. Reported is the number of patients with HTN at Baseline who achieved SBP \<130 mm Hg at Week 22.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients With a Reduction in 24-hour Average SBP by ≥5 mm Hg
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood pressure was measured by 24-hour ABPM. Reported is the number of patients with HTN at Baseline who achieved at least a 5 mm Hg reduction in 24-hour average SBP at Week 22.
